element.name: matroskademux
element.description: Demuxes a Matroska Stream into video/audio/subtitles
element.author: Ronald Bultje <rbultje@ronald.bitfreak.net>

caps.name: subtitle_%02d
caps.details: text/plain; application/x-ssa; application/x-ass; application/x-usf; video/x-dvd-subpicture; application/x-subtitle-unknown

element.name: matroskamux
element.description: Muxes video/audio/subtitle streams into a matroska stream
element.author: Ronald Bultje <rbultje@ronald.bitfreak.net>

caps.name: video_%d

caps.name: audio_%d
